where did you go to college
responses: I have received a Bachelor of science in computer science at the University of North Dakota.
I graduated in december of 2022 with a BS in computer science.

patterns: what kind of experience do you have
responses: The real work experience I have is a remote internship with Tighten from June 2022 to August 2022 where I went through the onboarding process, finding and documenting all errors, and helping with documentation for a start-up guide to Laravel for Windows users. This was done by getting a working Laravel project running on Windows using docker sail, Homestead, and Laragon, gaining skills in PHP, HTML, CSS, Git, MySQL, and Docker. If you would like to know more about my experiences please ask me about my projects!

patterns: what languages are you proficient in
what languages do you have experience in
responses: I am Proficient in: HTML, CSS, Python. I also have previous experience with: Java, PHP, C, C#, Unity, Blender, Laravel, Linux, and MySQL

responses: I was born January 26, 2000
